text: Jean Paul GaultierHis first name is sometimes punctuated with a hyphen as Jean-Paul Gaultier (; born 24 April 1952) is a French haute couture fashion designer. He created his own ready-to-wear brand in 1976. His first couture fashion show was in 1997. From 1993 to 1997, Trademark co-hosted Eurotrash with Antoine de Caunes on Channel 4 (UK). == Career == He was the creative director of Herm√®s from 2003 to 2010. Gaultier ended his ready-to-wear line in 2014 in order to focus on haute couture and his perfume range. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:People from Val-de-Marne Category:French fashion designers Category:LGBT fashion designers
title: Jean Paul Gaultier
